latestReviews.body: could you explain a little bit about my questions?
Several comments on dtel. please see inline. Thanks

Code looks good. 
I see all the attributes mentioned in the INT spec except hop latency and egress TX link utilization.

This implementation looks good. 
Have minor questions on if validation checks are needed as part set_dtel_attribute (to disqualify enabling both INT and POSTCARD for example) which can be addressed in future revisions if applicable.

comments.body: retest this please
well, let's remove it.

Offline discussed with @prsunny. Our goal is:
1. merge https://github.com/Azure/sonic-buildimage/pull/1712 into 201803 branch
2. merge this PR into master and 201803 branch

However one ASIC SAI implementation is not ready right now (Mellanox SAI is ok). The ETA for unblocking is 7/4.

reviews.body: Please also cherry pick this PR to 201803 after merged into master.

Offline discussed with @lguohan, SONiC should not use SAI_ACL_BIND_POINT_TYPE_VLAN because it is not a supported feature. So let's remove the latest commit from this PR.
Sorry for the late comment.

comments.body: Thanks for fixing it!  I missed this one at initial commit.     you are right, I think we may just check the command result for this case.

[![CLA assistant check](https://cla.opensource.microsoft.com/pull/badge/signed)](https://cla.opensource.microsoft.com/Azure/sonic-swss?pullRequest=387)
All CLA requirements met.
@JipanYanga  @lguohan Thanks for your review. Reflected your comments. PTAL
@stcheng Sorry for the delay. Added comments. PTAL

@ishidawataru @stcheng @lguohan  Not sure why this fix is missed.  The problem is still there and vlanmgrd will exit at this scenario.  
@ishidawataru do you mind updating your fix again with the latest code?

Hi @jipanyang. updated the code.
PTAL @stcheng @lguohan

@ishidawataru  thanks for the fix, it looks good to me.  Also did the test:
# before this change:
config vlan add 1200
config vlan member add 1200 Ethernet33
config vlan add 2000
config vlan member add 2000 Ethernet33

config vlan member del  2000 Ethernet33    <----- Vlanmgr will exit

```
May 22 05:44:23.021050 sonic ERR vlanmgrd: :- exec: /bin/bash -c "/sbin/bridge vlan del vid 2000 dev Ethernet33 && /sbin/bridge vlan show dev Ethernet33 | /bin/grep -q None && /sbin/ip link set Ethernet33 nomaster": Success
May 22 05:44:23.021157 sonic ERR vlanmgrd: :- main: Runtime error: /bin/bash -c "/sbin/bridge vlan del vid 2000 dev Ethernet33 && /sbin/bridge vlan show dev Ethernet33 | /bin/grep -q None && /sbin/ip link set Ethernet33 nomaster" : 
May 22 05:44:23.022464 sonic INFO swss.sh[8122]: 2018-05-22 05:44:23,021 INFO exited: vlanmgrd (exit status 255; not expected)
May 22 05:44:27.905887 sonic INFO supervisord 2018-05-22 05:44:23,021 INFO exited: vlanmgrd (exit status 255; not expected)
```

# After this change:   it works without problem.

root@sonic:/var/log# config vlan member add   2000 Ethernet33
root@sonic:/var/log# config vlan member del  2000 Ethernet33

```
May 22 05:51:50.483804 sonic NOTICE syncd: :- processEvent: key: SAI_OBJECT_TYPE_VLAN_MEMBER:oid:0x27000000000a38 op: remove
May 22 05:51:50.483804 sonic INFO syncd: brcm_sai_remove_vlan_member:551 SAI Enter brcm_sai_remove_vlan_member
May 22 05:51:50.484129 sonic DEBUG syncd: brcm_sai_remove_vlan_member:635 Removing member type 1 val 51 from vlan 2000
May 22 05:51:50.484129 sonic NOTICE orchagent: :- removeVlanMember: Remove member Ethernet33 from VLAN Vlan2000 lid:7d0 vmid:27000000000a38
May 22 05:51:50.484645 sonic INFO syncd: brcm_sai_remove_vlan_member:703 SAI Exit brcm_sai_remove_vlan_member
```
